duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide prompt and accurate customer service to internal and external customers, applying established quality standards.
Direct callers to appropriate services within the organization.
Collaborate with team members to efficiently meet patient needs.
Schedule appointments using electronic health records and update patient demographics.
Screen and direct phone calls, relay messages accurately, and provide helpful information.
Verify and update insurance and demographic information.
Adhere to schedule, breaks, and lunch schedules to maintain optimal phone coverage.
Quickly adapt to changing business needs with minimal intervention from leaders.
